GR14bhrgus_u:5875: ekakālārcane hīne dvitīye dviguṇaṃ caret // BhS_27.128 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5877: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣa sūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.129 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5881: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.131 //

GR14bhrgus_u:5889: tṛtīye triguṇaṃ caivaṃ vatsarānantu vardhayet // BhS_27.135 //

GR14bhrgus_u:5901: vaiṣṇavaṃ śrīmahīmantrān mūrti homaṃ tathā hunet // BhS_27.141 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5903: sopadaṃśamapakvaṃ ca śītaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tathā // BhS_27.142 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5905: vivṛtaṃ srāvitaṃ caiva vikṛtaṃ dṛṣṭi dūṣitam // BhS_27.143 //

GR14bhrgus_u:5913: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvaiva dviguṇaṃ cārcanaṃ haviḥ // BhS_27.147 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5915: nivedite tu haviṣi mantreṇāṣṭākṣareṇa tu // BhS_27.148 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5919: nivedite tu haviṣi śuddhodaissnāvyavai harim // BhS_27.150 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5921: aṣṭottaraśataṃ hutvā dviguṇaṃ tu nivedayet // BhS_27.151 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5925: prokṣya devaṃ susaṃprārdhya tadgṛhītvā nivedayet // BhS_27.153 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5929: asaṃskṛtaṃ tu tāṃbūlaṃ lepakeśānvitaṃ tathā // BhS_27.155 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5935: alābhe caiva sarveṣāṃ puṣpaṃ toyaṃ pragṛhyaca // BhS_27.158 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5937: nityahome vihīnetu vaiṣṇavaṃ daśaśo hunet // BhS_27.159 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5947: tasyopari yathoktaṃ tu baliberaṃ ca vinyaset // BhS_27.164 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5948: śirasā dhārayan pātraṃ trirdvirvā sakṛdeva vā /
GR14bhrgus_u:5949: dene tataḥ parīyācca devāgāraṃ pradakṣiṇam // BhS_27.165 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5955: hīne prātarbalau kuryānmadhyāhne dviguṇaṃ balim // BhS_27.168 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5956: tathā hīne ca madhyāhne rātrau triguṇamācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:5957: ekāhe tu balau hīne nityāgnau vā mahānane // BhS_27.169 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5958: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:5959: digdaivatyaṃ ca hutvā tu pradakṣiṇanuthācaret // BhS_27.170 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5963: dīpālābhe pāvakaṃ ca vyāhṛtyantaṃ yajettrayam // BhS_27.172 //

GR14bhrgus_u:5969: māne 'tīte tu padmāgnau vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktam // BhS_27.175 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5973: vardhaye dvatsarāntaṃ cāpyatīte vatsare punaḥ // BhS_27.177 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5974: sabhyaṃ saṃsādhya devābhimukhe vā dakṣiṇe nalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:5975: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca sūktaṃ pauruṣameva ca // BhS_27.178 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5977: hutvā cāryaṃ ca saṃpūjya balyuddharaṇamācaret // BhS_27.179 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5978: patite 'nnabalau bhūmyāṃ bhinne jīrṇe ca pūrvavat /
GR14bhrgus_u:5979: balimāpādya hutvā ca vaiṣṇavaṃ gāruḍaṃ tathā // BhS_27.180 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5982: sauraṃ saumyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca hutvā punarathācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:5987: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.184 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5990: vaiṣṇavaṃ mūrtimantraṃ ca hutvaiva daśaśaḥ kramāt /
GR14bhrgus_u:5993: akṛte balidāne tu prāśya pādodakaṃ hareḥ // BhS_27.187 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5995: pravṛttāyāṃ tu pūjāyāṃ havirdānāntameva ca // BhS_27.188 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5999: prasādaṃ vāpi gṛhṇīyāttatpūjā niṣphalā bhavet // BhS_27.190 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6001: tīrthaṃ puṣpaṃ tataḥ kṣīraṃ gandhaṃ ca tadanantaram // BhS_27.191 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6005: nitye karmaṇi sarvatra pūjakaṃ pūrvamarcayet // BhS_27.193 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6011: dviguṇaṃ tu samabhyarcya cānyaddviguṇa mācaret // BhS_27.196 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6013: pitā mṛṣyati putrāṇāṃ viśaṅkaṃ doṣasaṃcayam // BhS_27.197 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6014: pitā hi bhagavān viṣṇuputrāssyuḥ pūjakā hareḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:6031: viṣṇusūktaṃ nṛsūktaṃ ca digīśānāṃ manuṃ hunet // BhS_27.206 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6035: anyathā vaiṣṇavaṃ mantraṃ śatavāraṃ japetsudhīḥ // BhS_27.208 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6039: emabere kautuke tu kartavye śayanaṃ vinā // BhS_27.210 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6041: kṛte 'ṃkurārpaṇe hīne snapane vaiṣṇapaṃ tathā // BhS_27.211 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6046: hīne śāntādyarcane ca vaiṣṇavaṃ śāntameva ca /

GR14bhrgus_u:6051: bhūdaivatyaṃ ca juhuyānmṛtsu sarvāsvayaṃ vidhiḥ // BhS_27.216 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6053: dhānyeṣu vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva vāyavyaṃ ca hunedbudhaḥ // BhS_27.217 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6063: prāśanaṃ prokṣaṃ vāpi śāstre 'smin yatra codyate // BhS_27.222 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6075: ratnālābhe vaiṣṇavaṃ tu hutvā svarṇaṃ tu nikṣipet // BhS_27.228 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6087: anyathā tu kṛtaṃ kāryamakṛtaṃ syādasaṃśayam // BhS_27.234 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6091: saptāhantu mahāśāntiṃ kṛtvā tūtsava mācaret // BhS_27.236 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6093: tatra devo na ramate yo 'sāvutsava daivatam // BhS_27.237 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6119: grāmāntaraṃ prayāte tu dīkṣāmadhye padārthini // BhS_27.250 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6129: dīkṣāmadhye nānyadīkṣāṃ garbhadīkṣāṃ vinā caret // BhS_27.255 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6146: vyāhṛtyantaṃ ca hutvā tu vaiṣṇavān pūjya cācaret /

GR14bhrgus_u:6151: ardhahīnaṃ na kurvīta tadevāgatikaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.266 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6198: abhagne vātha bhagne vā dhvajaṃ tatra pūnaḥ kṣipet /

GR14bhrgus_u:6201: bhagne dhvaje na sagrāhyastamapsu vidhinā tyajet // BhS_27.291 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6208: atha vā sudṛḍaṃ gṛhya pratiṣṭhāṃ mahatīṃ caret /

GR14bhrgus_u:6215: dagdhaṃ dhvajaṃ parityajya punaranyaṃ samāharet // BhS_27.298 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6218: patite vātyayā caivaṃ dhvajasya śikhare tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:6219: mekhalāsu ca tatsarvaṃ navīkṛtya yathāvidhi // BhS_27.300 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6221: dhvajasya calane cāpi pramādādvraścane tathā // BhS_27.301 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6223: eṣa eva vidhiḥ prokto daṇḍeṣvanveṣu sarvataḥ // BhS_27.302 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6225: deve naṣṭe dhvaje susthe dhvajasyārādhanaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.303 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6233: tatsaṃdhau tu praśastaṃ syādyathā saṃphavamācaret // BhS_27.307 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6239: abhyantaraṃ bhaveccettu chidraṃ kuryāttu dṛkpathe // BhS_27.310 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6245: bālālayaṃ na tatra syādvāstuśuddhiṃ samācaret // BhS_27.313 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6248: uktena vidhinā yatra naṣṭe duṣṭe 'pi vā dhvaje /

GR14bhrgus_u:6265: tatra dīpaṃ samāropya na labhetphalamavyayam // BhS_27.323 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6270: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ dhvājameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6271: gāruḍaṃ daśaśo hutvā pratiṣṭhāṃ punarācaret // BhS_27.326 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6275: bherītāḍanahīne ca raudraṃ ca vyāhṛtīstathā // BhS_27.328 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6280: vaiṣṇavaṃ dhvaṃmetrau ca hutvā gāruḍameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6282: mudgānne tu tathā hīne vaiṣṇavaṃ vāyudaivatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:6284: hutvā yatnena bahuśo maudgikaṃ ca nivedayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6292: gāruḍaṃ dhvajamantraṃ ca sahastaṃ caiva hūyatām /
GR14bhrgus_u:6293: tataśśeṣaṃ samāpyeta viparītaṃ na kārayet // BhS_27.337 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6295: śāntiṃ pūrvoditāṃ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāṃ punarācaret // BhS_27.338 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6299: apramāṇaṃ paṭaṃ gṛhya mahāśāntiṃ samācaret // BhS_27.340 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6301: hīne tu cotsavāraṃbhasnapane vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_27.341 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6302: viṣṇusūktaṃ nṛsūktaṃ ca vāruṇaṃ caiva hūyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:6304: hīne kautukabandhe tu vaiṣṇavaṃ śāntameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6305: saudarśanaṃ ca hutvā tu kautukaṃ bandhayetpunaḥ // BhS_27.343 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6307: vaiṣṇavaṃ pāvakaṃ bhūmidaivatyaṃ ca hunedbudhaḥ // BhS_27.344 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6311: prātarbaliṃ tu nirvāpya hīne nityotsave tathā // BhS_27.346 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6313: sāyaṃ kuryādutsavaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ kārayetkramāt // BhS_27.347 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6320: pūrvoktāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā dviguṇaṃ tu baliṃ dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6321: brahmaṇaśca digīśānāṃ balidānaṃ tu naityikam // BhS_27.351 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6322: adāne niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā pūrvoktaṃ ṣaḍguṇaṃ baliḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:6329: antaśśace vāstuni tu na balibhramaṇaṃ caret // BhS_27.355 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6332: akāle tu baliṃ datvā kāle tu triguṇaṃ baliḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6335: na hi śraddhotsave doṣamuśantyenaṃ sa hītaraḥ // BhS_27.358 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6338: kṛtvā sīmāṃ viniścitya tataḥ kāryaṃ samācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:6341: devādīnāṃ balaṃ yasmādvardhate sa balissmṛtaḥ // BhS_27.361 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6350: pūrvoktāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā sarvatra dviguṇaṃ baliḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6351: devatāvāhanaṃ yatra deśeprāk kriyate tataḥ // BhS_27.366 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6353: maṇḍalaṃ ca jalaṃ kūrcamāhvānādhāra ucyate // BhS_27.367 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6355: balidānaṃ tu guptaṃ syānna tatbaśyantyavaidikāḥ // BhS_27.368 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6359: balidravye 'tha vā pātre patite bhūtale tathā // BhS_27.370 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6360: bhinne naṣṭe ca pūrvoktaṃ hutvānyaṃ balimāharet /

GR14bhrgus_u:6992: vāruṇaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva prakṣipyaiva ca tajjale /

GR14bhrgus_u:6995: devyādīnāṃ parṣadāṃ ca tattanmantraṃ savaiṣṇavam // BhS_29.51 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7015: bhūmau pidhāya tadberaṃ tadūrdhve juhuyātkramāt // BhS_29.61 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7017: uddhṛtya biṃbaṃ prakṣālya pañcagavyaiḥ kuśodakaiḥ // BhS_29.62 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7022: paṭe kuḍye 'tha vā likhya bere vidhivadarcite /
GR14bhrgus_u:7025: ācāryeṇa ca yenādau karṣaṇādyāḥ kṛtāḥ kriyāḥ // BhS_29.66 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7028: tadabhāve ca tatputraṃ pautraṃ naptārameva ca /

GR14bhrgus_u:7043: pūrvaṃ tu yogamārgeṇa pratiṣṭhāpyārcite punaḥ // BhS_29.75 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7044: devībhyāṃ saha paścāttu kārayet sthāpanaṃ yadi /

GR14bhrgus_u:7051: śayane nāsanaṃ caiva sthānakaṃ kārayedvidhiḥ // BhS_29.79 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7054: snapanaṃ baliberaṃ ca sthitaṃ sarvatra kārayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:7059: hutvā tu mahatīṃ śāntiṃ yathāsthāne tu sthāpayet /

GR14bhrgus_u:7068: saṃpūjya vaiṣṇavān śaktyādatvā vai bhūridakṣiṇām // BhS_29.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7070: saptāhaṃ tu mahāśāntiṃ hutvā vipraśataṃ tathā // BhS_29.88 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7072: ṣaṇmāse samatīte tu ramate tatra nohariḥ // BhS_29.89 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7109: teṣu garbhakṛhe caiva pīṭhe caiva bhavāni tu /
GR14bhrgus_u:7112: prāsādajāni rājñāṃ syuḥ prāsāde 'pi viśeṣataḥ // BhS_29.109 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7113: adhiṣṭhāne ca pāde ca prastare ca gale 'pi ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:7114: śikhare ca bhavāni syuḥkṣatriyāṇāṃ krameṇa tu // BhS_29.110 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7122: rudrālaye tu sarveṣāṃ nṛpasya tu guhālaye // BhS_29.114 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7141: bhaumeṣu tu careṣvatra nimittaṃ ca nimittinam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7143: sthireṣu pratimānāṃ tu rodane hasane tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:7144: jvalane ca tathā devaṃ saṃsthāpya taruṇālaye // BhS_29.125 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7146: śāntiṃ kṛtvā punaḥ kuryātthsāpanaṃ cārcanaṃ kramāt // BhS_29.126 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7148: svede ca rudhirasrāve sarvaṃ rodanavaccaret // BhS_29.127 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7158: ālipya śarkarāṃ kuryāc chāntiṃ divyapracoditām // BhS_29.132 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7166: veśmāntaraṃ vāsayitvā śāntiṃ kṛtvā yathocitām // BhS_29.136 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7173: parvatāgre taṭākasya tīre vā maṇḍapaṃ prapām /

GR14bhrgus_u:7188: sthaṇḍile dhānyarāśiṃ tu kṛtvā tasya ca madhyame /

GR14bhrgus_u:7193: vastrayugmena saṃveṣṭya bhūṣaṇaiśca vibhūṣya ca // BhS_29.149 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7196: ratnāni hema rajataṃ tāmraṃ kāṃsyaṃ tathā trapu /
GR14bhrgus_u:7205: madhye sūryaṃ tathendrādi bhārgavāṅgārakau tathā // BhS_29.155 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7217: hutvānte tu ghṛtenaiva vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktakam // BhS_29.161 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7223: yadi devālaye doṣaḥ kuṃbhapārśvetha sthaṇḍile // BhS_29.164 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7224: devaṃ taṃ sthāpya cābhyarchya nivedya ca mahāhaviḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7228: bhaumeṣu tatthsalaṃ prākṣya śiṣṭatoyena vai nṛpam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7229: tatpatnīṃ cābhiṣiñcecca guruṃ saṃpūjya pārthivaḥ // BhS_29.167 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7231: dakṣiṇāṃ bahulāṃ dadyājjīvo yajñasya dakṣiṇā // BhS_29.168 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7234: kuṃbhasya sādhanaṃ kṛtvā saptāhānte prabhuṃ tathā /

GR14bhrgus_u:7247: hemapātre tu sannyasya devamāvāhya tatra ca // BhS_29.176 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7248: abhyarcya tasya cordhvetu pīṭhe kuṃbhaṃ nidhāya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:7249: kuṃbhamūle tu suṣiraṃ sūcīmātraṃ vidhāya ca // BhS_29.177 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7261: evaṃ jñātvā vidhānena tattatkarmasu gauravam // BhS_29.183 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7263: dine dine pūrayitvā kuṃbhaṃ tenaiva secayet // BhS_29.184 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7266: atha vā varṣa kāmī vā mokṣārthī paśukāmanaḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:7274: agnimādhāya kuṃbhāṃ stu nava saṃveṣṭya tantunā /
GR14bhrgus_u:7275: adbhiḥ prakṣālya cotpūya kuśakūrcena cātvaraḥ // BhS_29.190 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7281: tantunā veṣṭite kṣīraṃ kṛhītvākarake pūnaḥ // BhS_29.193 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7287: atha vā snapanaṃ yāvattāvadudvartya mantrataḥ // BhS_29.196 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7293: dhruvaberārcane cettu saṃsnāpya pramukhe ghaṭam // BhS_29.199 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7301: kuṃbhaṃ saṃsādhya ca prāgvatsaptāhānte viśeṣataḥ // BhS_29.203 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7305: mahāśāntikramaṃ vakṣye vinā kuṃbhasya sādhanam // BhS_29.205 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7313: atha śuddhividhiṃ vakṣye vāstuhomaṃ hunettataḥ // BhS_29.209 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7319: arthabandhuvināśe ca durbhikṣe ca parājaye // BhS_29.212 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7322: saptāhaṃ vā navāhaṃ vā dvādaśārṇena vai pṛthak /
GR14bhrgus_u:7323: aṣṭottara sahasraṃ tu juhuyādvidhinā kramāt // BhS_29.214 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7324: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ sihitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre ekonatriṃśo 'dhyaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:7332: padmāvale vaiṣṇavaṃ ca viṣṇusūktaṃ ca pauruṣam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7337: vaikhānasaṃ pañcarātraṃ vaidikaṃ tāntrikaṃ kramāt // BhS_30.5 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7343: saumyaṃ sarvatra saṃpūjyaṃ grāmādiṣu viśeṣataḥ // BhS_30.8 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7344: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca geheṣu saumye nai vārcayeddharim /
GR14bhrgus_u:7347: viprāvāse janāvāse naiva kuryādanena tu // BhS_30.10 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7348: saumye vaikhānase mārge yadyāgne yena saṃkaraḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:7351: mahāśāntiṃ vidhānena saptāhaṃ vā tṣahantu vā // BhS_30.12 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7353: abhyarcya devadeveśaṃ saṃpūjyaiva tu vaiṣṇavān // BhS_30.13 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7361: pratiṣṭhāpya tadārabhya sarvaṃ tenaiva cācaret // BhS_30.17 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7407: namaste viṣṇave tubhyaṃ puruṣāya namo namaḥ // BhS_30.40 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7418: mātā tvaṃ me pitā tvaṃ me bhrātā tvaṃ me sakhāmama /

GR14bhrgus_u:7421: tvāmeva śaraṇaṃ pāpya nistaranti manīṣiṇaḥ // BhS_30.47 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7422: na hi te gopya te kiñcinna hyantyaviditaṃ tava /

GR14bhrgus_u:7424: na te rūpaṃ na karaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ nāsti te 'nagha /

GR14bhrgus_u:7427: tvatto me mānasaṃ janma prathamaṃ dvijapūjitam // BhS_30.50 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7428: vijñānaṃ tadidaṃ prāptaṃ brahmatvaṃ ca yadārjitam /

GR14bhrgus_u:7431: avedavihitassargo mayā kartuṃ na śakyate // BhS_30.52 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7439: sa vibhuḥ procyate brahmā vikhanā brahmavādibhiḥ // BhS_30.56 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7445: dakṣaṃ marīcinaṃ nīlalohitaṃ bhṛgumena ca // BhS_30.59 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7449: vedānāṃ vyasanādarpāk prāgrūpaṃ militaṃ tu yat // BhS_30.61 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7451: nāmnā vikhanasaṃ prāhuryaṃ ca śātātapaṃ tathā // BhS_30.62 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7453: tathā vasiṣṭhodakṣaśca nava brahmāṇar iritā // BhS_30.63 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7458: ke cidgṛhyāṇi vai cakrurgṛhyaśrautātmakāni tu // BhS_30.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7459: dharmaśāstrāṇi kecittu purāṇāni ca ke cana /

GR14bhrgus_u:7466: cakre ṛgādibhedaistu vyasitvā tu pṛthak pṛthak // BhS_30.69 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7467: ādikāle tu bhagavān brahmātu vikhanā muniḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:7482: yathā vedeṣu sarveṣu sāmavedaḥ praśasyate // BhS_30.77 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7486: adhīteṣu ca vedeṣu sāṃgeṣu labhate phalam // BhS_30.79 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7489: te sarve sūtramāśritya cainaṃ gacchanti mādhavam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7494: yasminneva tu saṃprokte sūtre vikhanasā purā // BhS_30.83 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7498: kiṃ bahūktena vidhinā sarvaṃ vaikhānasaṃ jagat // BhS_30.85 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7500: tadvaikhānaḥ paraṃ brahma iti vedādadhīmahi // BhS_30.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7510: dvijeṣu brāhmāṇāśśreṣṭhā brāhmaṇeṣu ca caiṣṇavāḥ // BhS_30.91 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7512: vaiṣṇavīṃ pratimāṃ loke vipraṃ vaikhānasaṃ tathā // BhS_30.92 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7513: gaṅgāṃ viṣṇupadīṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate mūlamasyāpi śāstrasya /
GR14bhrgus_u:7514: sārdhakoṭipramāṇataḥ upādiśatsa bhagavān asmabhyaṃ naimiśe vane // BhS_30.93 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7517: pūjānte snapanānte ca tathānte cotsavasya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:7521: tīrthaṃ gṛhītuṃ prathamcchetsa patati dhruvam yaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7528: tatpūjā niṣphalā ca syādrājarāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati // BhS_30.100 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7529: ṣaṭkālaṃ vā trikālaṃ vā dvikālaṃ kālameva vā /
GR14bhrgus_u:7530: ālaye bhagavatpūjā saumyena vidhinā kṛtā // BhS_30.101 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7532: tatrārcane tu śuddhātmā pūjakaḥ paritoṣitaḥ // BhS_30.102 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7533: tena rājā ca rājyaṃ ca yajamānaśca nānvayaḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:7539: devasyaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ ca sanmānaṃ pūjakasya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:7540: yastu na trāyate rājā tamāhurbrahmaghātukam // BhS_30.106 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7542: anyāyaiḥ paribhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ pārthivo gatiḥ // BhS_30.107 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7543: rājā pitā ca mātā ca rājā ca paramo guruḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7544: rājā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ paritrātā gururmataḥ // BhS_30.108 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7548: rājā dahati diḍena vipro dahati manyuvā // BhS_30.110 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7553: āpadyapi ca kaṣṭāyāṃ nāvamānyo hi pūjakaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7554: arcakena tu tuṣṭena yaduktaṃ devasannidhau // BhS_30.113 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7555: tadvākyaṃ tu ha rervākyaṃ nāvamānyo hi pūjakaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7556: arcakaṃ kopayedyastu sa hi devasya kopakṛt // BhS_30.114 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7558: gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā mālyaṃ tāṃbūlaṃ cākṣatādikam // BhS_30.115 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7564: nānyaṃ devaṃ namaskuryānnānyaṃ devaṃ prapūjayet // BhS_30.118 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7566: kāyena manasā vācā sa tu vaiṣṇava ucyate // BhS_30.119 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7570: avaiṣṇavasya pūjā tu teṣāmagre sudāruṇā // BhS_30.121 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7576: kartṛṣu brahmaviduṣo ye hi bhaktājanākdane // BhS_30.124 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7578: tasmātsaṃpūjya sarvādau bhaktyā vaikhānasaṃ dvijam // BhS_30.125 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7582: na hi sādhāraṇi sṛṣyirvaiṣṇavīti vicintayet // BhS_30.127 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7584: narāṇāṃ kṣīṇapāpānāṃ kṛṣṇe bhaktiḥ prajāyate // BhS_30.128 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7586: draṣṭuṃ vā śakyate mūḍhāḥ praveṣṭuṃ kuta eva hi // BhS_30.129 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7588: bhavantivai bhāgavatāste viṣṇuṃ praviśanti ca // BhS_30.130 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7590: vārṣiṇe jāyate puṃsāṃ govindābhimukhī matiḥ // BhS_30.131 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7591: pradveṣaṃ yāti govinde dvijān vedāṃśca nindati /
GR14bhrgus_u:7596: viṣṭau ca yajñapuruṣe śraddhā bhavati niścalā // BhS_30.134 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7598: bhavanti te bhāgavatā niśśreyaśaparā narāḥ // BhS_30.135 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7602: bhāvasaktaśca govinde viṣṇau bhāgavato hi saḥ // BhS_30.137 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7604: na drogdhā paravittādeḥ sahi bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ // BhS_30.138 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7605: sarvān devān hariṃ vetti sarvān lokāṃśca keśavam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7606: tebhyaśca nāsyamātmāvaṃ sa hi bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.139 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7610: yo na jānāti puṇyātmā sa hi bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.141 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7612: iti yo vai vijānāti sa hi bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.142 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7615: bhāvaṃ na kurute yastu sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7616: karmaṇā manasā vācā sa tu bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.144 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7618: bhāvena niṣpādayati jñeyo bhāgavato hi saḥ // BhS_30.145 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7622: tāṃ gatiṃ na narāyānti yāṃ tu bhāgavatā narāḥ // BhS_30.147 //

GR14bhrgus_u:8076: ādau ṣaṭkoṇaṃ vilikhya tanmadhye sādhyanāma vilikhya
GR14bhrgus_u:8088: om ham lam ram yam? likhitvā,
GR14bhrgus_u:8090: om na ma ssu dar śa nā ya iti vilikhya,
GR14bhrgus_u:8092: om ja ya ja ya nṛ siṃ ha iti vilikhya,
GR14bhrgus_u:8094: dalamadhye om na mo bha ga va te mahā su dar śa nāya svāhā iti vilikhya,
GR14bhrgus_u:8095: dalasaṃdhau om hum na mo bha ga va te va jra va rā hā ya svā hā iti vilikhya,
GR14bhrgus_u:8096: tadupari vṛttadvayaṃ vṛttadvayamadhye akārādikṣakārāntaṃ mātṛkāvarṇān vilikhya,
GR14bhrgus_u:8098: caturdvāre om ām hrīm krom iti vilikhya,
GR14bhrgus_u:8100: lam ram ham ṣam vam yam sam śam iti bījaṃ likhitvā,
GR14bhrgus_u:8106: tadgrāyatṣā taddaśāṃśaṃ japitvā mantrarājaṃ ca daśāṃśaṃ japitvā taddaśāṃśaṃ tarpaṇaṃ taddaśāṃśaṃ homaṃ taddaśāṃśaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ kārayet. yantradaśāṅgam:
GR14bhrgus_u:8107: - bījaṃ prāṇaṃ ca śaktiśca dṛṣṭirvaśyādikaṃ tathā mantrayantrasya gāyatrī bījasthāpanameva ca bhūtadikpālabījaṃ ca yantrasyāṅgāni vai daśa.
GR14bhrgus_u:8123: evaṃ pratidinaṃ kuryādante devaṃ tu ropayet /

GR14bhrgus_u:8453: saiddhasthalāni bhūyāṃsi bhaviṣyanti ca santi ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:8459: siddhā jānanti śāstrārthān siddhā jānanti cāgamān /
GR14bhrgus_u:8462: rājā taṃ tu vicāryaiva punarvaikhānasaiḥkramāt // BhS_34.53 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8465: atha paurāṇiko deśaḥ kathyate yatra yatra vai /

GR14bhrgus_u:8486: mānuṣaṃ pañcamaṃ proktaṃ sthalaṃ yatra viśeṣataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8487: grāme vā nagare vāpi śāstrokte sumanorame // BhS_34.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8493: manuṣyāḥ puṇyakarmāṇastatra tatra dine dine // BhS_34.68 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8505: yatra vā dṛśyate bhedo bhagavacchāstraśilpayoḥ // BhS_34.74 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8517: gṛhaṃ ca cititulyaṃ syādyatra nārādhyate hariḥ // BhS_34.80 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8519: bhuṅkte sa yāti narakān sūkareṣvasi jāyate // BhS_34.81 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8521: tasyānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyamabhakṣyeṇa samaṃ hi tat // BhS_34.82 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8527: yathā ca parame vyomni sannidhatte tathā hariḥ // BhS_34.85 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8529: sādhyā vidyādharā yakṣāssarvā vai devayonayaḥ // BhS_34.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8531: vāyurvāti sukhaṃ tatra sūryastapati tejasā // BhS_34.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8533: bhūmissasyavatī ca syātprasannaṃ ca nabho bhavet // BhS_34.88 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8536: na vyādhijaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cinnāpi jvarakṛtaṃ tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8537: na vyālajaṃ bhayaṃ vāpi bhavedatrana saṃśayaḥ // BhS_34.90 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8538: nopaplavo nṛpāṇāṃ vā mṛgāṇāṃ vāpyapāṃ bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8541: āgnihotrāśca hūyante tapyante 'tra tapāṃsi ca // BhS_34.92 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8544: prākṛtaṃ yo vadenmūḍhassa yāti narakaṃ dhruvam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8552: svarṇasteye ca yatpāpaṃ surāpāne ca yadbhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8557: tasmin deśe viśeṣeṇa sarvebhāgavatā harau // BhS_34.100 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8559: na hi sarvo 'pi sarvatra svayaṃvyaktasthalādikam // BhS_34.101 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8565: tasmādaprākṛtaṃ deśaṃ na brūyātprākṛtaṃ naraḥ // BhS_34.104 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8566: na ca sāmānyabhāvena taṃ paśyedyadi paśyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8567: naśyatyeva na saṃdeha iti śāstraviniścayaḥ // BhS_34.105 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8568: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ sahitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:8577: kulānāṃ śatamāgāmi samatītaṃ tathā śatam // BhS_35.3 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8579: saptajanmakṛtaṃ pāpamalpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu // BhS_35.4 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8583: praśastadeśe bhūbhāge yo naro bhavanaṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.6 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8587: pratimāṃ lakṣaṇavatīṃ yaḥ kārayati mānavaḥ // BhS_35.8 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8589: ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi sa mogate // BhS_35.9 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8591: tataḥ prayāti vaikuṇṭhaṃ nissamābhyadhikaṃ mahaḥ // BhS_35.10 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8593: puruṣaḥ kṛtakṛtyatvānnainaṃ śvo maraṇaṃ tapet // BhS_35.11 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8594: ye bhaviṣyanti ye 'tītā ākalpāḥ puruṣāḥ kule /
GR14bhrgus_u:8595: tāṃstārayati saṃsthāpya devasya pratiyāṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.12 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8601: nājñābhaṅgaṃ kariṣyanti bhavatāṃ jantavaḥ kvacit // BhS_35.15 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8605: pūjayanti sadā viṣṇuṃ te vastyājyāḥ sudūrataḥ // BhS_35.17 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8606: yastiṣṭhan yassvapan bhuñjan uttiṣṭhan skhaliteṣu ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:8609: nāvalokyā bhavadbhiste tattejo hanti vau gatim // BhS_35.19 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8611: arcayanti na te grāhyānarāḥ kṛṣṇāśrayoddhatāḥ // BhS_35.20 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8623: yaṃ yaṃ kāmayate kāmaṃ taṃ tamāpnotyasaṃśayam // BhS_35.26 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8626: karoti kṣudhitānāṃ ca bhojyāṃ pākakriyāṃ śikhī /
GR14bhrgus_u:8634: ahanyahani yatpāpaṃ kurute viṣayī naraḥ // BhS_35.31 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8636: sabāhyābhyantaraṃ tasya kāyo niṣkalmaṣo bhavet // BhS_35.32 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8640: udakābhyukṣaṇaṃ viṣṇoryaḥ karoti satā gṛhe // BhS_35.34 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8652: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ devāssahānugāḥ // BhS_35.40 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8656: tasminvimāne sa narastsrī vā tiṣṭhati śobhane // BhS_35.42 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8659: liptā ca yāvatā hastā viṣṇorāyatane mahī /
GR14bhrgus_u:8663: tat kṣayādiha cāgatya viśiṣṭe jāyate kule /
GR14bhrgus_u:8672: na tasyajāyate bhaṅgo gārhasthye tu kadā ca na // BhS_35.50 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8674: nāpnoti sāpi vaidhavyaṃ gṛhabhaṅgaṃ kadā ca na // BhS_35.51 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8680: so 'pi lokaṃ samāsādya modatevai śatakratoḥ // BhS_35.54 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8682: upalipte naro datvā na durgatimavāpnuyāt // BhS_35.55 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8692: tān lokān puruṣā yāntikṣīrasnānakarā hareḥ // BhS_35.60 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8697: yathā ca vimalaṃ kṣīraṃ yathā nirvṛtikārakam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8702: yassnāpayati devasya ghṛtena pratimāṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8703: indraprasthe dvijāgṣāṇāṃ sa dadāti gavāṃ śatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8704: gavāṃ śatasya viprāṇāṃ na dattasya bhavetphalam // BhS_35.66 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8706: purā rājarṣibhiḥ prāptā saptadvīpā vasundharā // BhS_35.67 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8708: pratimāsaṃ sitāṣṭamyāṃ ghṛtena jagataḥ patim // BhS_35.68 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8710: dvādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca gavyena haviṣā hareḥ // BhS_35.69 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8712: jñānato 'jñānato vāpi yatpāpaṃ kurute naraḥ // BhS_35.70 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8715: sa gatvāvaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma modate saha sūribhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8716: srajaṃ baddhvā sumanasāṃ yaḥ prayacchati viṣṇave // BhS_35.72 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8724: upānahau pāduke ca vāhanaṃ yānameva ca // BhS_35.76 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8727: sa vimānaṃ tu dutprāpaṃ prāpno tyeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.77 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8730: sāmīpyaṃ sahasā viṣṇoryāti sadyo sa saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8731: dhvajaṃ ca vādyamutpādya viṣṇusātkurute tu yaḥ // BhS_35.79 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8733: dāsīdāsaṃ tathātmāna mātmīyaṃ ca prayacchali // BhS_35.80 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8739: dīpaṃ prayacchati naro viṣṇorāyatane hi yaḥ // BhS_35.83 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8745: jātismaratvaṃ prajñāṃ ca prākāśyaṃ sarvavantuṣu // BhS_35.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8747: sarvakālaṃ ca cakṣuṣmān medhāvī dīpado naraḥ // BhS_35.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8748: jāyate narakaṃ cāpi tamassaṃjñaṃ na paśyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8754: kurvīta dīpahartāca mūkū'ndho jāyate jaḍaḥ // BhS_35.90 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8760: idānīṃ yātanā bhaugāḥkiṃ vilāpaḥ kariṣyati // BhS_35.93 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8762: etatkona vijānāti yena yūyaṃ pramādinaḥ // BhS_35.94 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8770: na vo vilapite kiṃ cididānīṃ dṛśyate phalam // BhS_35.98 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8777: yadbhūyo 'pi matiḥ pāpe na kartavyā kathaṃ ca na /
GR14bhrgus_u:8782: haviṣāṃ pāyasādīnāṃ haraye ca nivedanāt // BhS_35.104 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8798: taṭākānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi kṛtānāṃ cāpi ye guṇāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8799: triṣu lokeṣu sarvatra pūjanīyaḥ pratāpavān // BhS_35.112 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8805: taṭākāni ca sarvāṇi diśanti śriyamuttamām // BhS_35.115 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8807: sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃśrayanti jalāśayam // BhS_35.116 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8810: varṣākāle taṭāke tu salilaṃ yasya tiṣṭhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8812: śaratkā le tu salilaṃ taṭāke yasya tiṣṭhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8815: sa vai bahusuvarṇasya yajñasya labhate phalam // BhS_35.120 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8816: yasya vai śaiśire kāle taṭāke salilaṃ bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8819: atirātrasya yajñasya phalaṃ sa samupāśnute // BhS_35.122 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8821: vājimedhapalaṃ tasya phalaṃ vai munayo viduḥ // BhS_35.123 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8822: sa kulaṃ tārayetsarvaṃ yasya khāte jalāśaye /
GR14bhrgus_u:8823: gāvaḥ pibanti salilaṃ sādhavaśca narāssadā // BhS_35.124 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8824: taṭāke yasya gāvastu pibanti tṛṣitā jalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8828: durlabhaṃ salilaṃ ceha viśeṣeṇa paratra vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:8831: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ devāssahānu gāḥ // BhS_35.128 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8833: snātvā kurvanti karmāṇi tasya nākesthitirbhavet // BhS_35.129 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8835: tasya lokā bhavantyeva pāvanāḥ kṣativarjitāḥ // BhS_35.130 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8839: sthānarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jātayaṣṣaṭ prakīrtitāḥ // BhS_35.132 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8841: etā jātyastu vṛkṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ rope guṇāstvime // BhS_35.133 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8842: kīrtiśca mānave loke pretya caiva phalaṃ śubham /
GR14bhrgus_u:8843: labhate nāma loke ca pitṛbhiśca mahīyate // BhS_35.134 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8847: tasya putrā bhavantyete pādapā nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.136 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8849: puṣpaissuragaṇān vṛkṣāḥ phalaiścāpi tathā pitṛn // BhS_35.137 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8855: patraṃ phalaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā yasyārāme 'varopite // BhS_35.140 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8857: patraiḥphalair vāpuṣpairvā prīyate bhagavān hariḥ // BhS_35.141 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8861: ete svarge mahīyante ye cānye satyavādinaḥ // BhS_35.143 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8863: yajecca vividhairyajñaissatyaṃ ca satataṃ vadet // BhS_35.144 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8867: acalā hyakṣayo bhūmissarvān kāmān prayacchati // BhS_35.146 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8869: tasyaihikaṃ bhavetpuṇyaṃ tathā pāratrikaṃ bahu // BhS_35.147 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8874: brahmārpaṇadhiyā yastu guptaṃ dāsyati kiṃ cana /
GR14bhrgus_u:8877: yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ tu manasi kṛtvā yadyacca yor'payet // BhS_35.151 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8883: sarvameva bhaveddattaṃ vasudhāṃ yaḥ prayacchati // BhS_35.154 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8891: sa śatānyeva gokarṇamiti vedavido vidaḥ // BhS_35.158 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8895: evaṃ bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye prarohati // BhS_35.160 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8899: evaṃ dattāciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmirbharati bhūmidam // BhS_35.162 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8901: yo dadāti naraśreṣṭhassa na pracyavate divaḥ // BhS_35.163 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8907: gandharvāpsaraso yatra tatra tiṣṭhanti bhūmidāḥ // BhS_35.166 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8910: yasya yasya yadā bhūmi stasya tasya tadā phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8911: bhūmiṃ yaḥ pratigṛhṇāti yaśca bhūmiṃ prayacchati // BhS_35.168 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8917: punaśca janma saṃpāpya bhavedbhūmi patirdhruvam // BhS_35.171 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8918: yathā bhūmissadā devī dātāraṃ kurute patim /
GR14bhrgus_u:8921: mahīṃ dadatpavitrassyātpuṇyā ca jagatī yataḥ // BhS_35.173 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8928: yathā janitrī kṣīreṇa puṣṇāti svasutaṃ mudā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8931: na tatphalamavāpnoti yaddatvā vasudhāṃ punaḥ // BhS_35.178 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8933: ghorāśca vāruṇāḥ pāśā nopasarpanti bhūmidam // BhS_35.179 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8936: ādityā iva dīpyante tejasā di mānavāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8937: ye prayacchanti vasudhāṃ haraye lokasākṣiṇe // BhS_35.181 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8942: sa naḥ kulasya puruṣassano bandhussano guruḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8943: sa dātā sa ca vikrānto yo dadāti vasuṃdharām // BhS_35.184 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8947: dhenuṃ datvā suvratāṃ ca sopadhānāṃ payasvinīm // BhS_35.186 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8949: devadevasya tuṣṭyarthaṃ devāya brāhmaṇāya vā // BhS_35.187 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8950: na tasya śakyate vaktuṃ phalaṃ varṣaśatairapi /
GR14bhrgus_u:8952: tāvadvarṣa sahasrāṇi kāmān duhyeta sā varā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8955: sā gauḥ kāmadughā bhūtvā dātāramupasarpati // BhS_35.190 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8957: parāṃ vṛddhiṃśriyaṃ prāpya svargaloke mahīyate // BhS_35.191 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8959: gacchetsukṛtināṃ lokān gāvo datvā yathāvidhi // BhS_35.192 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8961: tasyāpi cākṣayā lokā bhavantīha paratra ca // BhS_35.193 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8962: yo vā dyūte dhanaṃ jitvāgāvaḥkrītvā prayacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8965: sa gatvā durlabhaṃ sthānamamaraissaha modate // BhS_35.195 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8967: sa gatvā virajān lokān sukhaṃ vasati devavat // BhS_35.196 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8971: tamaḥ praviśate datvā dvijaṃ kleśena yojayet // BhS_35.198 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8973: yuñjyātlkeśaistu yo vipraṃ datvaināṃ tadvṛdhā bhavet // BhS_35.199 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8974: yuvānaṃ balinaṃ śyāmaṃ halena saha yūthapam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8976: brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ caiva kulamekaṃ dvidhā kṛtam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8977: ekatra mantrā stiṣṭhanti havirekatra tiṣṭhati // BhS_35.201 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8985: tulyaprabhāvā devaiste modante psarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // BhS_35.205 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8989: yathaiva salile matsyassalilena sahoṣya te // BhS_35.207 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8993: tānu dattāsu loke 'smin kiṃ na dattaṃ bhavediha // BhS_35.209 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8996: suvarṇaṃ paramaṃ dānaṃ suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇā parā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8999: apipāpaśataṃ kṛtvā dattaṃ vipriṣu tārayet // BhS_35.212 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9004: agnyabhāve ca kurvanti vahnisthāne ca kāñcanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9016: na hyataḥ paramaṃ loke sadyaḥ pāpavināśanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9017: brahmakośasya śuddhasya suvarṇaṃ yaḥ prayacchati // BhS_35.221 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9019: iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ svarṇadānaphalaṃ mayā // BhS_35.222 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9021: viṣṇave ca śriyai bhūmyai sarvadevebhya eva ca // BhS_35.223 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9023: na śakyate phalaṃ tasya vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi // BhS_35.224 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9029: lokatantraṃ hi saṃjñāśca sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_35.227 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9030: annena sadṛśaṃ dānaṃ na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:9033: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ viśvaṃ jagadidaṃ mahat // BhS_35.229 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9035: annādbhavanti vai prāṇāḥ pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.230 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9043: annadaḥ prāpnute bhū yo bhuvi ceha ca yatsukham // BhS_35.234 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9045: api śvapāke śuni vā na dānaṃ vipraṇaśyati // BhS_35.235 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9051: brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa na sa pāpena muhyate // BhS_35.238 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9053: annadāmapi śūdre ca brāhmaṇasya viśiṣyate // BhS_35.239 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9059: asmākamapi putro vā pautro vānnaṃ pradāsyati // BhS_35.242 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9061: akāmovā sakāmo vā datvā puṇyamavāpnuyāt // BhS_35.243 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9063: viprā yamadhigacchanti bhikṣamāṇā gṛhaṃ sadā // BhS_35.244 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9065: mahābhoge kule pretya janma cāpnoti nityaśaḥ // BhS_35.245 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9067: nityaṃ mṛṣṭānnadāyī tu svarge vasati satkṛtaḥ // BhS_35.246 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9069: annadaḥ paśumān putrī dhanavān bhogavānapi // BhS_35.247 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9071: annadaḥprāṇado loke sarvadaḥ procyate tu saḥ // BhS_35.248 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9075: upyate yatra tadbījaṃ taddhi puṇyaphalaṃ mahat // BhS_35.250 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9081: annaṃ bhuvaṃ divaṃ khaṃ ca sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_35.253 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9082: anna praṇāśe bhidyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9085: nivartante viśeṣeṇa brahma cātra pradīyate // BhS_35.255 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9087: triṣulokeṣu dharmārthamannaṃ deyaṃ tato budhaiḥ // BhS_35.256 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9089: āyuśca vardhate tadvatteṣu lokeṣu niścitam // BhS_35.257 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9091: yacca meghagataṃ vāri śakro varṣati harṣitaḥ // BhS_35.258 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9094: tadyathā meghato vāri patitaṃ bhavati kṣitau /
GR14bhrgus_u:9095: tadā vasumatī devī snigdhā bhavati bhāvitā // BhS_35.260 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9099: agniṣṭomau hi tacchrakraṃ sṛjataḥ puṣyataśca ha // BhS_35.262 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9101: eka eva smṛto rāśistato bhūtāni jaṅgire // BhS_35.263 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9105: bhavanāni prakāśante divi teṣāṃ mahātmanām // BhS_35.265 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9112: vāpyo vīthyaḥ sabhāḥ kūpādīrghi kāścaiva sarvaśaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9115: kṣīraṃ sravanti saritastathā caivānna parvatāḥ // BhS_35.270 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9119: haviḥpātrādi sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmrameva vā // BhS_35.272 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9125: dadyāttāmrāṇi kāṃsyāni sārokyaṃ padameti saḥ // BhS_35.275 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9128: śvetaṃ vitānaṃ raktaṃ vā kṛṣṇaṃ pītaṃ ca śyāmalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9129: dukūlenātha paṭṭena tantunānyena vā kṛtam // BhS_35.277 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9131: sopadhānāṃ satalpāṃ ca khaṭvāṃ dadyācca yohareḥ // BhS_35.278 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9135: rājyakāmī tu rājā syātsārvabhaumo 'pi jāyate // BhS_35.280 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9137: cāmaraṃ hemadaṇḍaṃ ca vyajanaṃ ratnabhūṣitam // BhS_35.281 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9138: kevalaṃ hemadaṇḍaṃ vā bhaktyā śaktyā ca saṃyutam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9143: aśakyaṃ tatphalaṃ vaktuṃ sarvairapi surāsuraiḥ // BhS_35.284 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9144: sauvarmaṃ viṣṇurūpantu yo bhaktyaiva tu kārayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9149: haimaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yo bhaktyaivār'payeddhareḥ // BhS_35.287 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9152: haimaṃ yānaṃ tathāruhya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:9154: siṃhāsanaṃ vā yo dadyātsomalokaṃ sa gacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:9156: hṛdyavāksusvaro hṛdyo vāgmī sa tu bhavennaraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9162: yadyaddravyaṃ mudā yukto dadyāttu haraye naraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9163: tadagre pūjakebhyaśca gurave ca viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.294 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9167: yadyatkarma tadarthaṃ syātparicaryā ca tasya yā // BhS_35.296 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9168: tasyopacāraṃ yatkarma karoti śraddhayā tu yaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9169: sarvayajñaphalaṃ prāpya nāmīpyaṃ padamāpnu yāt // BhS_35.297 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9173: athār'cane phalaṃ vakṣye viśeṣeṇa madhudviṣaḥ // BhS_35.299 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9175: sāyaṃ prātaśca deveśaṃ namasyannatha cintayan // BhS_35.300 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9176: yaḥ pramāmaṃ muhuḥ kuryātsa tu yajñaphalaṃ labhet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9181: yaḥ kuryātpūjanaṃ viṣṇostatra devo vaseddhruvam // BhS_35.303 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9183: ābhirūpyācca biṃbasya sannidheḥ procyate hareḥ // BhS_35.304 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9184: āsanaṃ haraye datvā pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate ciram /
GR14bhrgus_u:9187: pādyamācamanīyaṃ ca samarpya haraye naraḥ // BhS_35.306 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9189: nityaṃ puṣpāṇi puṇyāni bhaktyā yastu samarcayet // BhS_35.307 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9193: tasyānantaphalaṃ prokta mananto bhagavān hariḥ // BhS_35.309 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9197: maṅgalaṃ tasya niśchidraṃ bhavedeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.311 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9199: sa cāna ntaphalaṃ prāpya modate viṣṇusannedhau // BhS_35.312 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9202: bahujātisumānāṃ ca dānena prīyate sa vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:9205: tulasīṃ mūrthni devasya samarpya madhuvidviṣaḥ // BhS_35.315 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9207: sarvāṅgeṣvarpayan puṣpaṃ sarvagasya naro hareḥ // BhS_35.316 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9215: sarveṣāmapi puṣpāṇāṃ tulasī prītidā hareḥ // BhS_35.320 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9217: anugacchati taṃ devo yathā gorvatsalā bhṛśam // BhS_35.321 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9223: ye kurvanti hareḥ pūjāṃ te kṛtārthāḥ kalau yuge // BhS_35.324 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9224: śuṣkaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vār'draṃ kāṣṭhaṃ vā tulasīdalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9227: varjyaṃ paryuṣitaṃ puṣpaṃ na varjyaṃ tulasīdalam // BhS_35.326 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9228: varjyaṃ paryuṣitaṃ toyaṃ na varjyaṃ jāhnavījalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9229: anyatparyuṣitaṃ varjyaṃ na varjyaṃ padmapuṣpakam // BhS_35.327 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9233: devā divisthitā ye vaitiṣṭhanti tulasīdale // BhS_35.329 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9235: yāvanna prāpyate puṇyā tulasī viṣṇuvallabhā // BhS_35.330 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9239: nārcayeddūrvayā durgāṃ na tulasyā surāntaram // BhS_35.332 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9243: harerabhyarcanāyāṃ ca tulasī sādhanaṃ param // BhS_35.334 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9247: tathā tuṣyati govindo yathaina tulasīdalaiḥ // BhS_35.336 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9249: tulasyaiva hareḥ pūjāṃ ye kurvanti sadā bhuvi // BhS_35.337 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9250: tasmāttulasyā sadṛśaṃ sa ca bhūtaṃ na bhāvi ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:9257: tulasīkānanaṃ yatra yatra vā harikīrtanam // BhS_35.341 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9262: sūryalokaṃ sa gatvaiva yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9263: ghṛtena kāpilenaiva dṛḍhavartiyutaṃ tu yaḥ // BhS_35.344 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9265: so 'ndhaṃ naiva praviśati narakaṃ narapuṅgavaḥ // BhS_35.345 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9269: tasya pāpāni naśyanti nirlepassa bhaviṣyati // BhS_35.347 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9271: candralokaṃ sa gatvaiva yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // BhS_35.348 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9272: sugandhi śubhamutpūtaṃ snānatoyaṃ ca yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9274: tataśca vāruṇaṃ lokaṃ prāpya tatraiva modate /
GR14bhrgus_u:9277: kārpāsamatha ca kṣaumaṃ kauśeyaṃ rāṅkavaṃ tathā // BhS_35.351 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9283: jāṃbūnadaṃ śātakuṃbhaṃ hāṭakaṃ vaiṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_35.354 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9284: śruṅgī ca śuktijaṃ caiva jātarūpamataḥ param /
GR14bhrgus_u:9289: rājaśriyaṃ ca bhuktvā nte viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BhS_35.357 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9299: tasya prasannau jāyete daṃpatī jagataḥ patī // BhS_35.362 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9300: mātrāṃ ca devadesya datvā haste viśeṣataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9309: kṛsaraṃ vinivedyaiva devasya mudito naraḥ // BhS_35.367 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9311: gaulyaṃ nivedya devasya prāpnoti guḍaparvatān // BhS_35.368 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9313: yavodanasya donena nīrogo bhavati dhruvam // BhS_35.369 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9317: sugandhi svādu śuddhaṃ ca pānīyaṃ yo harerdadet // BhS_35.371 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9319: kadalyā nārikelasya cūtasya panasasya ca // BhS_35.372 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9320: phalāni ca nupakvāni bhaktyā śuddhāni yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9324: tāṃbūlaṃ kramukairyuktaṃ mukhavāsaṃ ca yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9327: balaṃ balavatāṃ labdhvā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BhS_35.376 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9328: baliṃ seveta yo bhaktyā so 'pi yajñaphalaṃ labhet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9331: viṣṇoḥ kathāstu saṃkīrtyastotraiḥ stutvā ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ // BhS_35.378 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9337: sakāmānāṃ phalaṃ kāmyamakāmānāṃ paraṃ padam // BhS_35.381 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9339: utsāha utsavaḥ prokto manuṣyāṇāṃ viśeṣetaḥ // BhS_35.382 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9343: utsavaṃ devadevasya yaḥ kuryātsvakulaṃ svakam // BhS_35.384 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9344: uttārayan svayaṃ viṣṇossa yāti paramaṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9346: sa yajño vo narān yuṣmānuttārayati niścayam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9347: iti vedā vadantīti sa utsava udīrya te // BhS_35.386 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9349: yaścotsavena yajate tayostulyaṃ phalaṃ nmṛtam // BhS_35.387 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9351: devasyāśnuvate sarvaṃ ye yajante saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.388 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9354: karmāṇā manasā vācā te 'pi yānti phalaṃ bahu /
GR14bhrgus_u:9355: grāme vā ragare va'pi pattane vā mahotsavaḥ // BhS_35.390 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9357: yatra deśe janapade rāṣṭre vā pyutsavo hareḥ // BhS_35.391 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9369: ālepanaṃ mārjanaṃ ca rajaḥ praśamanaṃ tathā // BhS_35.397 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9372: yānaṃ vahanti ye viprāste yānti brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9373: rathaṃ vahanti ye cāśvāste 'pi yāntisurālayam // BhS_35.399 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9377: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni ye tatrādhīyate janāḥ // BhS_35.401 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9378: te pare vyomni devasya pārśve vartanti nisspṛhāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9386: taddravyaṃ varthate tasya naśyaṃ tyevāśubhāni tu /
GR14bhrgus_u:9387: rājño rāṣṭrasya taddravyaṃ samṛddhyaiva bhaviṣyati // BhS_35.406 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9389: nirmāti yaḥprapāṃ viṣṇordevasya nnapanāya vai // BhS_35.407 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9419: yastu kuryājjaladroṇīṃ snānapīṭhaṃ ca śārṅgiṇaḥ // BhS_35.422 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9420: sa sarvaiḥ pūjyayānantu pīṭhe cātyunna te vaset /
GR14bhrgus_u:9421: evaṃ yassnapanaṃ viṣṇoḥ kārayecchaktito naraḥ // BhS_35.423 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9423: ante vimāsamāruhya haimaṃ devaiḥ parīvṛtaḥ // BhS_35.424 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9427: devadevasya viṣṇostu snapanaṃ bhaktimāṃstu yaḥ // BhS_35.426 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9428: seveta so 'pi pāpmabhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9431: utsavaṃ sevateyastu so 'pi yajñaphalaṃ labhet // BhS_35.428 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9435: anyeṣvapi ca puṇyeṣu kāryeṣu jagataḥ prabhum // BhS_35.430 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9438: khaṇḍite sphaṭite dhāmni dūṣite ca sūdhādibhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9439: samādadhyātpunardhāma sa lokaṃ yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ // BhS_35.432 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9441: sthāpayedbhakti yuktaśca sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // BhS_35.433 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9443: yaḥ sandhāya punaḥ kuryātpritiṣṭhāṃ pūrvavanmudā // BhS_35.434 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9445: śīrṇe jīrṇe tathā bhinne bhūṣaṇādau viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.435 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9449: tasya kāyakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva naśyati // BhS_35.437 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9453: yo dadyāducitāṃ vṛttiṃ sa yamaṃ nopasarpati // BhS_35.439 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9459: tasya vāso bhavetsvarge cāvadidrāśca turdhaśa // BhS_35.442 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9461: tasya tuṣyati deveśassa tu svārājyamaśnu te // BhS_35.443 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9463: dṛṣṭvā ca śraddhayā yuktoyo devamupatiṣṭhate // BhS_35.444 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9469: prāyaścittavidhānaṃ tu provāca jagatāṃ hitaḥ // BhS_35.447 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9476: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyaṃ tridaśairapi /
GR14bhrgus_u:9477: iha loke 'khilān kāmānanubhūya sukhaṃ cirāt // BhS_35.451 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9487: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa kriyālope ca yatphalam // BhS_35.456 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9494: svayaṃ nivartate yastu tasya syānmahatī vipat /
GR14bhrgus_u:9495: saṃkalpya devatāgāraṃ nirmātuṃ yo viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.460 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9497: ācāryassatataṃ goptā ācāryastu pitā smṛtaḥ // BhS_35.461 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9499: ārabhya gehanirmāṇaṃ devasya jagataḥ pateḥ // BhS_35.462 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9500: asamāpya tu yo mūḍho nivarte pravilobhataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9501: tasya saṃpadvināśassyāt kruddho bhavati cāvyayaḥ // BhS_35.463 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9503: yaḥ kuryādantarāyaṃ tu tasya puṇyaṃ vinaśyati // BhS_35.464 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9504: yena vighnastadā bhūyāttaṃ hatvāpi na doṣabhāk /
GR14bhrgus_u:9505: yastu śāstroditaṃ karma kurvantaṃ ca padārthinam // BhS_35.465 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9509: adhvare vartamāne tu saṃbhārān śāstracoditān // BhS_35.467 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9510: yo na dadyātsa pāpīyān nāpnuyāt karmajaṃ phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9511: pratiṣṭhāpya harerbiṃbaṃ yo na satkurute gurum // BhS_35.468 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9513: pratiṣṭhānte tathā nityamavicchinnaṃ tu pūjitum // BhS_35.469 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9517: sa bhavedbrahmahā caiva dhanaṃ tasya vilupyati // BhS_35.471 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9521: anyaṃ vā yojayettatra tāvubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ // BhS_35.473 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9525: sarve ca kramaśaḥ pūjāṃ kartumarhanti te yataḥ // BhS_35.475 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9526: pitryaṃ bhavati devasya dāyādyaṃ pūjanaṃ svataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9529: yastudadyādarcakāya bhṛtyarthaṃ ke valaṃ dhanam // BhS_35.477 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9537: nirmāti brāhmaṇaṃ bhūyo yajamānastu devalam // BhS_35.481 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9545: svadattāṃ varadattāṃ vā yo hareta vasundharām // BhS_35.485 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9551: pañca kanyānṛte hanti daśa hanti gavānṛte // BhS_35.488 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9554: sarvaṃ bhūmyanṛte hanti no brūyādanṛtaṃ kvacit /
GR14bhrgus_u:9559: brahmasvaṃ brahmahatyā ca daridrasya ca yaddhanam // BhS_35.492 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9561: brahmasve no matiṃ kuryātprāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // BhS_35.493 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9567: lohacūrṇāṃśca cūrṇāṃśca viṣaṃ vā jarayetpumān // BhS_35.496 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9569: devasvaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ ca lobheno pahinasti yaḥ // BhS_35.497 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9575: daśavājisamā kanyā bhūmidānena sā samā // BhS_35.500 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9577: ācchettācānumantā ca tānyena narake vaset // BhS_35.501 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9579: brāhmaṇānāṃ hṛte kṣetre hanyādāsaptamaṃ kulam // BhS_35.502 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9581: dadaddhi bhūmiṃ sādhubhyo vindate phūmimuttamām // BhS_35.503 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9585: tadarcakārpitāṃ bhūmiṃ yo hareta yateta vā // BhS_35.505 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9586: kiṃ punastasya vaktavyaṃ na bhavettasya niṣkṛtiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9587: na vācā śakyate vaktuṃ gatistasya durātmanaḥ // BhS_35.506 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9588: mriyeta sadya evāsau jāyate 'tha punaḥ punaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9589: na tasya śaraṇaṃ kvāpi labhyate pāpakarmaṇaḥ // BhS_35.507 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9593: vasanti bhūyo jāyante nīcayoniṣu ca dhruvam // BhS_35.509 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9595: gale nigalitaḥ pāśaiḥ kṛṣyate nirayeṣu saḥ // BhS_35.510 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9603: uṣitvā narakeṣvete jāyante phaṇināṃ kule // BhS_35.514 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9613: kṛtinaḥ pretya narake pacyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ // BhS_35.519 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9615: upacārādihāno tu pāpasyedaṃ phalaṃ bhavet // BhS_35.520 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9623: snānadravyavihīne ca snānahīne tathaiva ca // BhS_35.524 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9627: agnidāhabhayaṃ caiva mandāgnitvaṃ ca jāyate // BhS_35.526 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9639: anyārāmodbhavaṃ puṣpaṃ nār'payediti ke cana // BhS_35.532 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9640: ārahare ca śukre ca manvādiṣu yugādiṣu /
GR14bhrgus_u:9643: tulasīṃ ye vicinvanti te kṛntanti hareśśiraḥ // BhS_35.534 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9647: bhugnapatraṃ na ca grāhyaṃ kṛmiduṣṭaṃ ca nāharet // BhS_35.536 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9649: sthalajaṃ noddharetpuṣpaṃ chedayejjalajaṃ na tu // BhS_35.537 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9654: snānaṃ kṛtvā tu ye ke citpuṣpaṃ gṛhṇanti vaidvijāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9657: snānaṃ kṛtvātu madhyāhne puṣpāṇi na samāharet // BhS_35.541 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9660: sa tu tenaiva pāpena maṇḍūko jāyate naraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9663: sa pūti gandhasaṃyuktaḥ kuṣṭhī caiva prajāyate // BhS_35.544 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9664: janmadvayaṃ tu vai mūḍhaśśūdratāṃ yāti mānavaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9670: arghyahīne tu devasya kulaṃ bhavati ninditam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9676: havirnivedane hīne durbhikṣaṃ bhavati dhruvam // BhS_35.550 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9678: nālikeraphale hīne hīne kṣīrādike tathā // BhS_35.551 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9680: hīne bhakṣyādike caiva vividhe haviṣī prabho // BhS_35.552 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9686: śāntasya pūjane hīne tathā caivānapāyinām // BhS_35.555 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9693: bhūtapīṭhasya pārśve vā dakṣiṇe vā viśeṣataḥ, /
GR14bhrgus_u:9696: śrīdevyā arcane hīne saṃpadāṃ tu bhavet kṣayaḥ // BhS_35.560 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9698: agnipūjāvihīne tu nyūne vā mantravarjite // BhS_35.561 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9704: balakṣayo janānāṃ syātpitṝṇāṃ patanaṃ bhavet // BhS_35.564 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9710: biṃbanyāsavihīne tu kalatraṃ tasya naśyati // BhS_35.567 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9713: dakṣiṇādānahīne tu sā pūjā niṣphalā bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9724: utsave ca viśeṣaṇa yajamānabhayaṃ bhavet // BhS_35.574 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9726: viṣude cāyane caiva hīne tatroktakarmaṇi // BhS_35.575 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9729: akāle ca kṛte vāpi bhavet kṣāmabhayaṃ tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:9732: nimitte yadi saṃprāpte snāpayeccenna mādhavam // BhS_35.578 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10480: sapta pañca ca janmāni tato mānuṣatāṃ vrajet // BhS_36.344 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10482: sa bhaveddurmanā dīno pretya ceha ca janmani // BhS_36.345 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10486: āsanāni tvasaṃkhyāni devāgāre na cācaret // BhS_36.347 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10490: savyaṃ khūlaṃ sukhaṃ caiva gomukhaṃ garuḍaṃ tathā // BhS_36.349 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10492: kuñjaraṃ kukkuṭaṃ nāgaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ kraiñcaṃ ca kūrmakam // BhS_36.350 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10494: yonyāsanaṃ vāsakaṃ ca dhīraṃ padmāsanaṃ tathā // BhS_36.351 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10496: tripadaṃ hastikarṇaṃ ca hemamardhāsanaṃ tathā // BhS_36.352 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10498: anyāni śāstrasiddhāni yāni santi viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.353 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10500: bhuñjīyāddevatāgāre yaḥ pāpassa tu durmanāḥ // BhS_36.354 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10501: kukṣirogārdito bhūtvā janmāni daśa pañca ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10504: devāgāre viśeṣeṇa sa bhavennindito janaḥ // BhS_36.356 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10508: āpośanaṃ tu kṛtvaiva yadadyādbhojanaṃ tutat // BhS_36.358 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10512: sa gacchennarakān krūrān yāvanta udabindavaḥ // BhS_36.360 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10514: niveditaṃ tu devasya devasyāgre viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.361 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10523: niveditaṃ tu devasya saṃtuṣṭyaisvasya tasya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10524: tasya tuṣyati deveśa ādātā tu vipadyate // BhS_36.366 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10528: na jātu pāvayennaiva pāvayetpāvayenna tu // BhS_36.368 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10531: tena bhuktaṃ bhavetpāpaṃ dātureva na saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10536: pretya sṛgālatāṃ yānti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.372 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10538: caṇḍālo jāyate pretya kṣudhitaśca carenmuhuḥ // BhS_36.373 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10539: vikrīṇate tu ye viprā vāṇijye dattacakṣuṣaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10543: kaṇamannasya vāna syāttapyante tatra te janāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10544: ye gṛhītvā tadannādi bhuñjate kṣudhitā janāḥ // BhS_36.376 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10546: annaṃ prāṇā manuṣyāṇāṃ sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_36.377 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10548: annaṃ vikrīṇate ye tu prāṇavikrayiṇaḥ smṛtāḥ // BhS_36.378 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10554: sa nidhiṃ puratassiddhaṃ tyaktvā bhikṣati kākiṇīm // BhS_36.381 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10558: sā hānistanmamahacchidraṃ sā bhrāntissā tu vikriyā // BhS_36.383 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10562: magneneva mahāsiṃdhau hateneva ca vātyayā // BhS_36.385 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10566: tasmāddevagṛhaṃ gatvā naro nānyaparo bhavet // BhS_36.387 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10568: sa sarvo 'pi mudhā proktomithyetyeke vadantitam // BhS_36.388 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10569: na hi devasya purataḥ kvacidapyanṛtaṃ vadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10570: satyasvarūpī bhagavān satyaṃ tasmaina gūhayet // BhS_36.389 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10571: satyameva paraṃ brahma satyameva paraṃ tapaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10572: satyameva paro yajñassatyameva paraṃ śrutam // BhS_36.390 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10573: satyaṃ deveṣu jāgarti satyaṃ dharmataroḥ phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10575: ādyo vidhiśca vidyā ca sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10576: satyaṃ yajñantathā vedāssatyā devī sarasvatī // BhS_36.392 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10582: satyaṃ tu vadato loke tulitaṃ syānna saṃśayaḥ // BhS_36.395 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10583: aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā kṛtam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10586: satyamāhuḥparaṃ dharmaṃ satyamāhuḥ paraṃ padam // BhS_36.397 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10587: satyamāhuḥ paraṃ brahma tasmātsatyaṃ na lobhayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10592: vaktavyaṃ ca sadā satyaṃ na satyādvidyate param // BhS_36.400 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10594: snātavyaṃ manasā yuktaistatsnānaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam // BhS_36.401 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10595: devārthe vā parārthe vā putrārthe vā ''tmane tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10596: ye 'nṛtaṃ nābhibhāṣante te svargaṃ yāntimānavāḥ // BhS_36.402 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10601: parīkṣante ca sarvāsu daśāsu puruṣaṃ sadā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10604: devāgāre viśeṣeṇa te praṇaśyanti sānvayam // BhS_36.406 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10608: te yānti narakaṃ pāpā jāyante nīcayoniṣu // BhS_36.408 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10610: tathānte krūrā nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.409 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10612: te 'pi tittiritāṃ bhūtvā jāyante janmapañcakam // BhS_36.410 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10616: asārāṇi tu śāstrāṇi bhūyāṃsi pṛthivītale // BhS_36.412 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10618: teṣu śāstreṣu ye jātāśśāstrārthāśca viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.413 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10620: citraśilpā na saṃdeho narastena na mucyate // BhS_36.414 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10621: sā vidyā yā hariṃ stauti sā kriyā yattadarcanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10622: yā nyā yadanyadakhilaṃ duṣṭodarkā hi jīvikā // BhS_36.415 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10623: na hi devagṛhaṃ gatvā śāstrārthairnī rasairnaraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10625: viśālaṃ vāṅmayaṃ sarvaṃ sṛṣṭvā sraṣṭā hariḥ prabhuḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10631: pāṭhanaṃ lekhanādyaṃ ca naiva kuryādgṛhe hareḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10634: yastu devagṛhaṃ gatvā roditi praṇayādyathā // BhS_36.421 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10635: duḥkhitaḥ stauti vā devaṃ tatsyānmānasikaṃ malam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10636: nirvāṇaparamaṃ sthānaṃ mlānena manasā tu yaḥ // BhS_36.422 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10637: sevate sa na jānāti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10638: nārī vā puruṣo vāpi gatvā devagṛhaṃ kvacit // BhS_36.423 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10643: prāpya tit tiritāṃ kālaṃ vasiṣyanti ciraṃ bhuvi /
GR14bhrgus_u:10644: naivātra hiṃsāṃ kurvīta prāṇināṃ duḥkhadāṃ kvacit // BhS_36.426 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10649: kāmakrodhau ca saṃyamya tataḥ siddhimavāpnu te /
GR14bhrgus_u:10651: ātmanassukhamanvicchan sa pretya na sukhī bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10652: ātmopamastu bhūteṣu yo vaibhavati pūruṣaḥ // BhS_36.430 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10658: prakhyāpane ca dāne ca sukhaduḥkhe priyāpriye // BhS_36.433 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10660: ṛṣayo brāhmaṇā devāḥ praśaṃsanti viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.434 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10662: karmaṇā na naraḥ kurvan hiṃsāṃ jātu vicakṣaṇaḥ, // BhS_36.435 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10663: vācā ca manasā caiva tato duḥkhātpramucyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10666: yathā sarvaścatuṣpādvai tribhiḥ pādairna tiṣṭhati // BhS_36.437 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10670: evaṃ lokeṣvahiṃsā tu nirdiṣṭādharmataḥ purā // BhS_36.439 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10672: yatsarveṣviha bhūteṣu dayāhiṃsātmikā tu yā // BhS_36.440 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10673: na bhayaṃ vidyate jātu narasyeha dayāvataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10676: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtāni dadatīti jagau śrutiḥ // BhS_36.442 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10677: kṣataṃ ca patitaṃ caiva skhalitaṃ klinnamāhatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10678: sarvabhūtāni rakṣanti sameṣu viṣameṣu ca // BhS_36.443 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10679: nainaṃ vyālamṛgā ghnanti na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10680: mucyate bhayakāleṣu mokṣayedyo bhaye parān // BhS_36.444 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10681: prāṇadānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:10682: na hyātmanaḥ priyakaraṃ kiṃ cidastīha niścitam // BhS_36.445 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10684: mṛtyukāle hi bhūtānāṃ sadyo jāyeta vepathuḥ // BhS_36.446 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10690: hanyamānāśca dṛśyante vivaśā ghātukā narāḥ // BhS_36.449 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10692: ākramya māryamāṇāśca trāsyantyanye punaḥ punaḥ // BhS_36.450 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10698: ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānamahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ // BhS_36.453 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10700: ahiṃsā paramaṃ mitramahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham // BhS_36.454 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10701: sarvayajñeṣu vā dānaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu vā plutam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10704: ahiṃsrassarvabhūtānāṃ yathā mātā yathā pitā // BhS_36.456 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10708: dhānyānyapi na hiṃseta yassa bhūyādahiṃsakaḥ // BhS_36.458 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10711: tapyamāne śarīre tu śarīre cendriyāṇi tu /
GR14bhrgus_u:10712: tiṣṭhanti svavaśe tasya nṛpāṇāmiva kiṅkarāḥ // BhS_36.460 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10714: indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena dānena ca damena ca // BhS_36.461 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10723: pītvā ca bhakṣayitvā ca upavāsavrataṃ caret // BhS_36.466 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10725: na prāśnīyādvimūḍhātmā rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet // BhS_36.467 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10726: na hi devagṛhaṃ gatvā vivadeta naraḥ kvacit /
GR14bhrgus_u:10727: na tat sthānaṃ vivādasya tasmāttaṃ dūrata styajet // BhS_36.468 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10728: mano 'navasthitaṃ yasya sa nālaṃ pūjitaṃ harim /
GR14bhrgus_u:10729: yasyaiva nirmalaṃ cittaṃ sor'hassarveṣu karmasu // BhS_36.469 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10733: na badhnāti padaṃ haṃsaḥ kadācitkardamāṃbhasi // BhS_36.471 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10734: na yogyā mādhavaṃ stotuṃ vāgduṣṭā cānṛtādinā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10741: aśikṣayaiva manasaḥ prāyo lokaśca vañcyate // BhS_36.475 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10745: kruddhaḥ pāpaṃ na kuryātkaḥ kruddho hanyādgurūnapi // BhS_36.477 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10749: vācyāvācyaṃ prakupito na vicānāti karhi cit // BhS_36.479 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10751: yassamutpatitaṃ krodhaṃ kṣamayā tu nirasyati // BhS_36.480 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10752: yathoragastvacaṃ jīrṇāṃ sa vai puruṣa ucyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10755: parāpavādaṃ na brūyānnāpriyaṃ ca kadā cana // BhS_36.482 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10759: sa eva bhagavān devassarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiyuk // BhS_36.484 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10762: iti saṃcintya bhūyo 'pi sarveṣvapi ca jantuṣu /
GR14bhrgus_u:10767: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ na daivaṃ tasya mṛṣyati // BhS_36.488 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10769: devatāmandiraṃ prāpya kāleṣvanyeṣu vā tathā // BhS_36.489 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10773: maryādāsu sa tiṣṭhanti sa doṣaḥ strīṣu garhitaḥ // BhS_36.491 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10775: striyo hi mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_36.492 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10779: pāpīyaso narān yadvai tyaktalajjā bhajantitāḥ // BhS_36.494 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10780: strīyaṃ hi yaḥ prārthayate sannikarṣaṃ ca gacchatir /
GR14bhrgus_u:10781: iṣacca kurute sevāṃ tamevecchanti yoṣitaḥ // BhS_36.495 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10785: rūpavantaṃ virūpaṃ vā pumānityeva bhuñjate // BhS_36.497 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10792: paṅguṣvanyeṣu kuṣṭheṣu ye cānye kutsitā narāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10795: apyanyonyaṃ pravartantena hi tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu // BhS_36.502 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10799: vadhabandhabhayāccāpi svayaṃ guptā bhavanti tāḥ // BhS_36.504 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10801: prājasya puruṣasyeva yathā bhāvās tathā strīyaḥ // BhS_36.505 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10805: dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣaṃ hyanyaṃ yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ // BhS_36.507 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10807: rakṣitāraṃ na mṛṣyanti svabhartāramasat striyaḥ // BhS_36.508 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10811: kṣuradhārā viṣaḥ sarpo vahnirityekataḥ striyaḥ // BhS_36.510 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10813: na cāsāṃ mucyate kaścitpuruṣo hastamāgataḥ // BhS_36.511 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10815: śaṃbarasya ca yā māyā yā māyā namucerapi // BhS_36.512 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10817: hasantaṃ prahasantyetā rudantaṃ prarudanti ca // BhS_36.513 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10819: yadi jihmā sahasraṃ syājjīvecca śaradāṃ śatam // BhS_36.514 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10821: uśanā veda yacchāstraṃ yacca veda bṛhaspatiḥ // BhS_36.515 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10822: strībuddhyā na viśiṣyeta surakṣyā na bhavantitāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10824: iti yāstāḥ kathaṃ rakṣyāḥ puruṣairdurbharāḥ striyaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10826: apāstāśca tathā sadyo vikurvanti manaḥ striyaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10827: na ca strīṇāṃ kriyāḥ kāściditi dharmo vyavasthitaḥ // BhS_36.518 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10830: durvāgarbhavaṃ ratiṃ caiva dadau strībhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10831: na tāsāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ śakyaṃ kartuṃ puṃsāṃ kathaṃ cana // BhS_36.520 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10833: vācā ca vadhabandhairvā kleśairvā vividhaistathā // BhS_36.521 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10834: na śakyā rakṣitāṃ nāryastā hi nityamasaṃyatāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10837: nātaḥ paraṃ hi nārīṇāṃ vidyate ca kadā cana // BhS_36.523 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10840: na ca dahyanti gacchantyaḥ sutaptairapi pāṃsubhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10841: nānilo 'gnirna varuṇo na cānye tridaśāntathā // BhS_36.525 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10842: priyāḥ strīṇāṃ yathā kāmo ratiśīlā hi yoṣitaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10843: sahasrekila nārīṇāṃ prāpyetaikā kadā cana // BhS_36.526 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10845: naitā jānanti pitaraṃ na kulaṃ na ca mātaram // BhS_36.527 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10846: na bhrātṝnna ca bhartāraṃ na ca putrān na devarān /
GR14bhrgus_u:10847: līlāyantyaḥ kulaṃ ghnanti kūlānīva saridvarāḥ // BhS_36.528 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10849: na te sukhāya mantavyāḥ svedajā iva bindavaḥ // BhS_36.529 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10853: tādṛśaṃ strīṣu vijñeyaṃ nādhikaṃ tāsu vidyate // BhS_36.531 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10855: tadvat strīṣvapi vijñeyaṃ na saukhyaṃ paramārthataḥ // BhS_36.532 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10857: tādṛśaṃ strīṣu vijñeyaṃ nādhikaṃ tāsu vidyate // BhS_36.533 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10859: tathā devotsavādīnāṃ sevā tāsāṃ niṣidhyate // BhS_36.534 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10860: na hi svatantrato yoṣijjātu gacchet sthalāntaram /
GR14bhrgus_u:10861: na hi nirmimate vṛddhā līlayā devamandirān // BhS_36.535 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10863: anugacchetpitā bhrātā bhartā putro 'tha vā yadi // BhS_36.536 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10871: tasmāt strīṣu na kartavyaḥ prasaṃgo devatākṛhe // BhS_36.540 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10874: na hīdṛśamanāyuṣyaṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10877: yāvanto romakūpāḥ syuḥ strīṇāṃ gātreṣu nirmitāḥ // BhS_36.543 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10886: sa tu caṇḍālatāṃ prāpya jāyate janmanāṃ śatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10894: iti devagṛhaṃ gantuṃ vyādhito naiva cārhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:10897: arcituṃ sevituṃ cāpi dātuṃ dravyacayaṃ tathā // BhS_36.553 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10900: janmāni nava pañcāpi jāyate malabhuk kṛmiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10906: uṣṇīṣī na ca seveta naiva pāṇau dhṛtāyudhaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10909: śvitrī saṃjāyate mūḍho navajanmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.559 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10911: caṇḍālayonitāṃ yāti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.560 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10913: tvaṅkāro vā vadho veti vidvatsu na niśiṣyate // BhS_36.561 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10915: paranindā ca śāstrasya parasya tu vinindanam // BhS_36.562 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10917: nindayā vai pareṣāṃ tu ninditāste punassmṛtāḥ // BhS_36.563 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10919: tathā parastutiṃ caiva vidhinā saṃtyajennaraḥ // BhS_36.564 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10920: paraḥ parātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ procyate tu yaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10921: tadagre 'nyasya devasya na stutiṃ stāvayennaraḥ // BhS_36.565 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10923: pūjayedyadi manyeta pūjārhaṃ vāsa naśyati // BhS_36.566 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10931: śaktau satyāṃ viśeṣeṇa yastulobhādinā naraḥ // BhS_36.570 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10933: na tasya vidyate puṇyaṃ sa tūcchāstraṃ vravartate // BhS_36.571 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10938: tasmātkurvīta yatnena śaktilobhaṃ na jātu cit /
GR14bhrgus_u:10939: anyathā yadi kurvāṇaḥ phalaṃ naiva prapadyate // BhS_36.574 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10941: viṣaṃ prāśnāti sammūḍho yassvasmai pacate naraḥ // BhS_36.575 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10947: viṣṇorniveditaṃ yastu na bhuṅkte manujādhamaḥ // BhS_36.578 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10955: yā ca bhūyāṃsi loke 'sminnutpādayati santatam // BhS_36.582 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10961: navāni kāle jātāni sasyādīni viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.585 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10965: teyāntinarakān ghorān kṛtaghnā yāntiyān bahūn // BhS_36.587 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10967: navaṃ sasyaṃ phalaṃ puṣpaṃ dadhikṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ madhu // BhS_36.588 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10972: so 'pi caṇḍālatāṃ prāpya naśyedeva na saṃśayaḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:10985: yastu devagṛhaṃ prāptān vaiṣṇavān bhagavatpriyān // BhS_36.597 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10995: na sukhaṃ na ca saubhāgyaṃ yenātmāntūyate svayam // BhS_36.602 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11070: namo namo namaste 'stu namaste 'stu namo namaḥ // BhS_36.639 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11082: aparādhāḥ kṛtā ye tān kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.645 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11084: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.646 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11086: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.647 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11112: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaśca kaliśceti caturyugam // BhS_37.1 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11119: na bhayaṃ na ca santāpo na lobho na ca mānitā /

GR14bhrgus_u:11166: ghore kaliyuge prāpte dvijā vedaparāṅmukhāḥ // BhS_37.28 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11180: uttamā nīcatāṃ yānti nīcāścottamatāṃ tathā // BhS_37.35 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11242: bhaviṣyanti kalau prāpti rājāno mlecchajātayaḥ // BhS_37.66 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11462: adya cātā jaganmātā phālgune revatī tithau // BhS_37.176 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11487: dīpāropo bhavettatra kadā vā kārtikī śubhā /

GR14bhrgus_u:11504: arcane vāsudevasya bhaviṣyanti ratā narāḥ // BhS_37.197 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11508: idaṃ ca bhagavacchāstraṃ cirasthāyi kariṣyati // BhS_37.199 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11514: tadā harirmahāvīraḥ kalkī nāma bhaviṣyati // BhS_37.202 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11550: śrī vikhanasamahāgurave namaḥ śrautasmārtādikaṃ karma nikhilaṃ yena sūtritam tasmai samastavedārthavide vikhanase namaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:11551: jayatyātmeśvarosni dradhyāna saudhapriyātithiḥ śrīmatpatrapurīvāsaḥ śrīrāmassītayā gṛhī.
